channel.title: What?
channel.description:
[java] java.sql.SQLException: You have an error in your SQL syntax; check t he manual that corresponds to your MySQL server version for the right syntax to use near '`=789, `x`='452, `y`='213, `x5`='0, `y5`='0, `r`='440', `pt1`='1', `pt 2`='0', `f' at line 1: 'UPDATE `rscd_players` SET `combat`=59, `v2recordwin`=0, skill_total`=789, `x`='452, `y`='213, `x5`='0, `y5`='0, `r`='440', `pt1`='1', `p t2`='0', `fatigue`='220', `muted`='0', `haircolour`=0, `topcolour`=2, `trouserco lour`=8, `v2recordloss`=0, `skincolour`=14, `headsprite`=0, `bodysprite`=0, `mal e`=0, `skulled`=2203287552000, `combatstyle`=0 WHERE `user`=1311' [java] at org.rscdaemon.ls.net.DatabaseConnection.updateQuery(DatabaseC onnection.java:109) [java] at org.rscdaemon.ls.model.PlayerSave.save(PlayerSave.java:519) [java] at org.rscdaemon.ls.packethandler.loginserver.PlayerSaveHandler. handlePacket(PlayerSaveHandler.java:65) [java] at org.rscdaemon.ls.LoginEngine.processIncomingPackets(LoginEngi ne.java:129) [java] at org.rscdaemon.ls.LoginEngine.run(LoginEngine.java:55) [java] Java Result: 1
Lost.

item.title: What?
item.dc:creator: @omfg_i_own omfg i own
item.description:
@omfg_i_own wrote:

 [java] Adding save data for: 8p

 [java] java.sql.SQLException: Data truncation: Out of range value for colum

n ‘skulled’ at row 5: ‘UPDATE rscd_players SET combat=59, skill_total=789,
x=452, y=‘213’, fatigue=‘220’, haircolour=0, topcolour=2, trousercol our=8, skincolour=14, headsprite=0, bodysprite=0, male=0, skulled=220
3311079424, combatstyle=0, v2recordwin=0, x5=0, y5=0, r=440, pt1=1, p t2=0, muted=0, v2recordloss=0 WHERE user=1311’
[java] at org.rscdaemon.ls.net.DatabaseConnection.updateQuery(DatabaseC
onnection.java:109)
[java] at org.rscdaemon.ls.model.PlayerSave.save(PlayerSave.java:519)
[java] at org.rscdaemon.ls.packethandler.loginserver.PlayerSaveHandler.
handlePacket(PlayerSaveHandler.java:65)

ne.java:129)

item.title: What?
item.dc:creator: @CodeForFame CodeForFame
item.description:
@CodeForFame wrote:

You’re missing a ` before skill_total.
